Shipping with small bets

I default to small, observable bets when the path ahead is fuzzy. It keeps momentum high and gives teams space to learn without blowing up scope.

Start with a skinny slice

Pick the thinnest version that proves value—one persona, one flow, one integration. It is easier to deploy, reason about, and de-risk.

Instrument the hypothesis

Before launch, decide which signals confirm the bet is working. Add logging, traces, and a simple dashboard that the team can check together.

Make reversal cheap

Feature flags, phased rollouts, and generous observability make it painless to slow down or roll back. Calm delivery is about optionality, not heroics.
